About Me

I'm Adam, born and raised New Yorker from Manhattan, and I'm always looking for the best way to improve myself, mentally and physically.

Since graduating with a B.S. in Computer Science, I've been diving into other languages and frameworks like React, Java, and Golang, trying to find ways to expand my skills.

Coming from experience with the financial sector, I want to shift course and develop new exciting technologies for the people and impact the everyday person's life positively.
